item.title: So it begins...
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: The tear down and rebuilding of my blog site. It's been sitting stagnant for so long, and I finally got sick of the excuses and tore it all down. I was going to initially just upgrade Wordpress, but I had nothing but trouble during the upgrade. My guess is that the original install was so old, or so filled with plug-ins and hacks that the standard upgrade just wouldn't ever work. So I exported all my years of ramblings into a fresh install, ready for me to get off my ass and work on a new look for it. I can't promise that today, tomorrow or even next week, but keep stopping on by to see what I come up with. The default Wordpress theme will continually remind me that I should be working on my site and skimming my Google reader for interesting blog entries.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
I'm just glad you finally got comments working finally.
Now you just need to get your blogroll updated from the default list, and get some mod_rewrite rules kicking for your permalinks. :)
Yeah I have to tackle the blogroll, the permalinks thing though is a puzzler. For some reason when I try turning it on wordpress breaks. It's very odd.
